## Why is Time Management Important?

>    "Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.'" - Lao Tzu

![](images/whyimportant.png)
 

## Common Time Wasters

>    "The trouble with time management is that nobody tells you how to manage time. They tell you to buy a planner, and then they assume you will use it." - Dr. Mardy Grothe

![](images/timewaster.png)

## Goal Setting and Prioritization


>    "You cannot do everything at once, but you can do something at once." - Zig Ziglar

![](images/prioritize.png)

## Planning and Scheduling

"Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe." - Abraham Lincoln

![](images/planning.png)
  

## Time Management Techniques

>    "Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort." - Paul J. Meyer
 
![](images/timetechniques.jpeg)

## Managing Distractions and Interruptions

 
>   "In order to concentrate, we must be selective, even to the point of setting aside the trivial." - Richard Foster

![](images/managingdistractions.png)

## Time Management and Stress Reduction

>    "The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another." - William James

![](images/stressreduction.jpeg)

## Time Management and Work-Life Balance

>    "The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot." - Michael Altshuler
